instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message:
Hi guys, 
ASD (EFI and OS) shows the same error related to Temperature (Th2H) sensor:
EFI - SMC IO failed
OS - Unable to read sensor

Thanks

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message:
Why did you replace the GPU? C9560 is the real problem.
Any more errors when you continue the test?

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message:
The GPU showed random failures so it was replaced. The machine was stress tested overnight (connected to a charger) and worked smoothly.
When running on battery it experienced random restarts and the error above. That is the only error ASD shows.
C9560 is measured at 1.55V (should it be measured at 1.8V?). 
AN UPDATE:
I've also noticed that Q5503 was not attached properly - now ASD shows no errors BUT the machine still goes into sudden sleep mode.

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message: GPU was never bad and C9560 still needs to be replaced! Let ASD loop to see if it catches an error. Disconnect battery indicator to rule out a bad lid sensor.

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message: C9560 worked again temporarily after you heated it. It is close to the GPU so it gets heat in the BGA rework process whether indirect from top heater or from bottom IR. When it returns to its initial state, it'll crash again. Replace it with a non-tantalum.

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message: had this exact issue, thought it was the GPU but it was C9560 ;)

threads.title: 820-2850 Sudden restarts after GPU replacement
threads.message: C9560 was replaced and the machine looks to be running smoothly. Thanks guys, much appreciated
